chichewa_translation: Bvuto palibe | Palibe bvuto | Nditha kutelo

english_phrase: Let me help you with that

chichewa_translation: Ndikhulupilila kuti ndakuyankhani | Ndikhulupilila kuti ndakuthandizani
Ndikhulupilila kuti ndakuyankhani | Ndikhulupilila kuti ndakuthandizani
Ngati muli ndi mafunso ena | Mulinso ndimafunso ena ngati?
Khalani omasuka kufunsa | Ndinu omasuka kufunsa | Mutha kufunsa ndithu

english_phrase: Anything else I can help with

chichewa_translation: Pali chinanso ngati | Mulinso ndi funso lina
Zokhudza zimene munandifunsa | Zokhudzana ndi zimene munandifunsa
Ndiyankhe zimene munafunsa | Ndiyankhe motele funso lanu
Ndiyankhe zimene munafunsa | Ndiyankhe motele funso lanu
